Dustin Waggoner is an aspiring software engineer, lover of Javascript/AngularJS, certified Scrum Master, devoted learner, and customer satisfaction professional, based in Seattle, WA

Currently I am pursuing my goal to becoming a kickass developer. As a former 4.0 graduate in IT and now a student at Bloc.io, I am making this goal a reality. When I'm not hacking at the world, I love gaming, trivia, board games, fishing, and the outdoors.
